name: Spirit of the Tongue
description: The Spirit of the Tongue lives in everybody, most discover it in their childhood. Depending on the context sticking out your tongue can mean many things. Some even cary their heart on the tongue...depending on what you say the tongue is either soft like a feather or sharp as a knife that cuts deep. The tongue also is your taste and can bring you joy or disgust with just a single drop. Embrace your tongue! When i start spirit paintings i dont know what they will look like in the end, i let the present energy flow thru me and guide every stroke, every line for it to be visualized. www.oibelart.com Twitter: @oibel1
